## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G08580](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G08580)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AAC1</u>
- **Gene Name:** ADP/ATP carrier 1
- **Description:**   ADP/ATP carrier 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2077778
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
